title: ESS基础插件怎么修改钱币的名称
author: @自由之翼

replies.author: 西木凛
replies.txt_content: Essentials文件夹里的config,用搜索功能搜索刀币（Shift+数字键4）符号直达

replies.author: 筒子
replies.txt_content:
你需要有iConomy插件
iConomy文件夹
Config文件
里面有可以修改~
Default:
    Currency:
      # Major is the first segment [Major].Minor

      # Major ([Major].Minor) 1.00 Dollar (With Seperate 1 Dollar)
      Major: [ '节操', '节操' ]
